name: Roboballer
description:
[THIS GAME MAY BE INFURIATINGLY HARD. PROCEED WITH CARE]

Boh the Robot was abandoned in an old research facility, with only his favorite Ball at his side. Help him escape by destroying everything in his path. Bounce the ball around to wreck computers and get points.

TIPS
Stomp the ball to send it upwards. Gently bash it to send it rolling. Sometimes waiting for the ball to settle is best. There's a time limit, but you're not penalized for taking too long. Patience is key.

For the Genre Mash Jam 21
By nate-the-bard and Undead_Monky

ASSETS
Tileset by 0x72
Music by MightyJor
